verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H6256>after<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> was <S%H8666>expired,<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> that <S%H4428>kings<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to battle, <S%H3097>Joab<s%> led <S%H5090>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2428>power<s%> of the <S%H6635>army,<s%> and <S%H7843>wasted<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>country<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah.<s%> But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>tarried<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah,<s%> and <S%H2040>destroyed<s%> it.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of their <S%H4428>king<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> it to <S%H4948>weigh<s%> a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and there were <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in it; and it was <S%H1961>set<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H7218>head:<s%> and he brought also exceeding much spoil <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H7235><s%> <S%H7998><s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And he brought <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in it, and <S%H7787>cut<s%> them with <S%H4050>saws,<s%> and with <S%H2757>harrows<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and with <S%H4050>axes.<s%> Even <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>this,<s%> that there <S%H5975>arose<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> at <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> at which <S%H227>time<s%> <S%H5444>Sibbechai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5598>Sippai,<s%> that was of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H3211><s%> of the <S%H7497>giant:<s%> and they were <S%H3665>subdued.<s%>

And there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3265>Jair<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3902>Lahmi<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite,<s%> whose <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H6086>staff<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver's<s%> <S%H4500>beam.<s%>

And yet <S%H5750>again<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> at <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> where <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of great <S%H4060>stature,<s%> whose fingers and <S%H676>toes<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> on each hand, and <S%H8337>six<s%> on each foot: and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> was the <S%H3205>son<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant.<s%>
But when he <S%H2778>defied<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8092>Shimea<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> him.

These <S%H411><s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto the <S%H7497>giant<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath;<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
